turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I am going to need to put in an order for some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, do you want to go with the usual place? Sal's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that will be fine. Since it will be with the 7 o'clock clients and their kids, we will need at least 3 pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a preference on size? All large okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, how about we do this. Two large and something else the kids will like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I see they are doing a two large pizza 2 toppings deal. It includes an order of monkey bread. How do you think they will like those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is great. Two two pizzas, make one meat and the other veggie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any preference on what type of toppings? How about sausage and pepperoni, and on the other, let's put pineapple and olives?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Those sound good. Any idea how much it will cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check for you. The deal comes to 24.99, but should be under 30 total. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup, that seems fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything other than the deal? Can I get some drinks for everyone as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That won't be necessary. We should be covered with what we have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, how about the order, do you want it delivered here? Otherwise I can be free to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you can pick it up, otherwise traffic will delay it longer than we can afford to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I put the order in for you, you should be getting a receipt sent through text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, I appreciate it. Any idea on time frame?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, the order will be ready for pickup following completion, which should be about 25 minutes from now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank again, it definitely makes tonight a little easier.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, I will watch the time and be there for the pickup soon.
